home.text: Your plane has crashed and you are the only survivor. You are in a dense jungle and must choose your path wisely to survive...

start.text: The small plane is rapidly filling with smoke when you come to. There is debris all around and a small fire towards the cockpit.

options.A: I need to look for supplies
options.B: Get out of seat and go towards the back exit
options.C: Go to the closer exit in front of me

supplies.text: You look for supplies and find a survival kit.

back_exit.text: You look for supplies and find a survival kit.

front_exit.text: You look for supplies and find a survival kit.

end.text: Thank you for playing! Press Continue to exit.
